headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: ID of your developer application. You can find the App ID by navigating to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Authorized access token for permission verification. To get an access token that is generated after a TTCM creator grants you the permission scopes of a TikTok creator account, see Get or renew an access token .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: The return code. For the complete list of error codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: The return message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log id of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: scope
fields.description: Scope of permissions for the specified access token. For instance, "user.info.basic,video.list" .

fields.name: creator_id
fields.description: Application specific unique ID of the TikTok creator account. Note : You can pass the value of this field to the parameter creator_id in the request of three TikTok Creator Marketplace endpoints: /tcm/creator/authorized/ , /tcm/order/update/creator/ , and /tcm/creator/authorized/video/list/ .
